SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
Class that represents the controller in the MVC pattern. It handles the action of the players on the model.

  • Method Details

    • createGame

      Creates and starts the actual game.

    • createLobby

      public void createLobby(int numPlayers) throws RemoteException

    • addPlayerToLobby

      public void addPlayerToLobby(String nickname, ModelViewListener mvListener, String oldNickname) throws RemoteException
      Creates the listener for the client that is trying to connect. If the lobby is empty, the number of players for the game must be set. Calls lobby.addPlayer() if lobby isn't full. Communicate the result of the action to the client through its listener.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player to add.
      mvListener - the listener associated with the nickname
      oldNickname - the old nickname of the user. It may be different from the actual one in case another equal one was found.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - default rmi exception
      See Also:
      • Lobby

    • getGame

      public Game getGame()
      Getter for the game.
      Returns:
      the game

    • updateModel

      public void updateModel(GenericEvent event, String nickname) throws RemoteException
      Receive an event from the client and acts on the model.
      Parameters:
      event - the event sent from the client
      nickname - the player that sent the event
      Throws:
      RemoteException - default rmi exception
      See Also:
      • GenericEvent
      • Game

      public ModelViewListener getMVListenerByNickname(String nickname)
      Method to get a listener (if present) associated with a specific nickname.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname
      Returns:
      the listener or null if none of them with that nickname has been found.

    • addMVListener

      public void addMVListener(ModelViewListener listener) throws RemoteException
      Method to add and start a listener. Calls handleEvent() into it to make it work.
      Parameters:
      listener - the listener to be added.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - default rmi exception
      See Also:
      • ModelViewListener

    • addTempMVL

      public void addTempMVL(ModelViewListener listener) throws RemoteException
      Public method to add a temporary listener to the list. The controller will establish if it'll go to the real one or not by the login.
      Parameters:
      listener - the listener to add.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - default rmi exception
